headline.main: DR. BUTLER, NOW 81, LOOKING TO FUTURE; Columbia University and World Peace Still Chief Interests, Educator Declares HE HAS NO IDEA OF RETIRING $50,000,000 More to Expand School Kept as His Goal -- Reports Health Good

lead_paragraph: Dr. Nicholas Murray Butler is 81 years old today but his advanced age has not dimmed his ardor for the two great interests in his life -- Columbia University, over which he has presided for almost forty-two years, and world peace.
abstract: Dr N M Butler views on peace attainment discussed
snippet: Dr. Nicholas Murray Butler is 81 years old today but his advanced age has not dimmed his ardor for the two great interests in his life -- Columbia University, over which he has presided for almost forty-two years, and world peace....
